You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesS S] > &sup3

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&sup3;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00b3/index.htm U+000B3].
  * `&sup3` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00b3/index.htm U+000B3].
